settings.editor: Hey there! I'm so glad you found this website. I started this as a way of developing my WordPress skills, but now I use it to showcase my capabilities, not just to potential clients, but also to anyone just remotely interested. I'm also into creating web pages via coding, and you can find my other personal website (created entirely via coding), at: . I also blog, just for the fun of it, and you can go check out my blogging page at: https://wordpress.com/page/blog882029100.wordpress.com/5
